body:
Hey guys, back again with another spotlight. If you want one of your own, fill out the application format here: https://goo.gl/forms/f9XjcBVJ5vMl72bZ2. Today's spotlightee is Atdit!

What is your username in Minecraft and what is your favourite game on Avicus?
-My ingame name is AtditC and my favourite game is Arcade with all its minigames. (I like each one of them the same (heart) ) 

Introduce yourself in 3-4 sentences.
-Hi! :D I'm known as AtditC in game and I love playing video games with friends! I'm 15 years old, I play a lot GTA V, Minecraft and CS:GO and my favourite school subject is physics!

​What are you the most excited/obsessed over at the moment?
-On Avicus: I'm excited about my staff interview, and if I'll make it! I'm also very excited about Skywars and if it will be played actively, or only barely.

In Rl: School exams, and ... that's it, at the moment.

What interests you the most in life?
-Science (especially physics, chemistry and astronomy), technology and everything related to computers! Electronics aren't bad too!

​What music/art/media do you like?
-I like all genres of music as long as the song itself is good :P But I prefer Rap, Dubstep, House and Skrillex-like music x)

​Where are you from?
-I was born and I live in the german part of Switzerland, close to Germany!

​What do you spend most of your time doing while on Avicus?​
-Well, I always played Nebula in the rusher position, but because my pvp skills are getting worse with the time (or the other players all get better :P ), I want to focus helping the community and Avicus itself in the future. Also, I'm always active on the report section of the forums.

Anything else you want to mention?
-(redacted; Russian curse words)

title: Community Spotlight #9 - AtditC
